text: I am thrilled to apply for the Software Engineer role. My experience at Tech Corp taught me how to handle high-pressure deadlines while maintaining code quality.
Thank you for the offer, but I must decline. I have decided to pursue a different path that aligns closer with my long-term goals in NLP research.
The hardest part of coding isn't the syntax; it's the logic. Yesterday, I spent 4 hours debugging a loop only to realize I was iterating over the wrong array.
